ygData.subject: I hate Shadows of Luclin and I don't even own it yet...
ygData.msgSnippet: Just adding to the whining and general post-patch woes. The machine i m on at the moment is a boat anchor, barely met the min reqs for EQ in the first place
ygData.messageBody:
Just adding to the whining and general post-patch
woes. The machine i'm on at the moment is a boat
anchor, barely met the min reqs for EQ in the first
place (loaner while mine gets repaired after the
rather thorough trashing it recieved from FedEx) but
post-Luclin patch the game refuses to recognize my
video card. Got DirectX 8.1 installed, but the video
card manufacturer stopped putting out video cards (and
new drivers) uh... three years ago from what I can
gather on websites. I don't mind not being able to run
Luclin on here, it'll run fine on my machine once I
get it fixed, but this has to be maddening for
customers on low end machines who just want to be left
alone to play EQ Classic.

______________________________________________________
Send your holiday cheer with http://greetings.yahoo.ca
